title: Alex Gerrard wears stunning black lace corset outfit in leggy display at ceremony
text:

Alex Gerrard made a spectacular return to the public eye as she wore an incredible black outfit on Saturday night.

The 37-year-old model, who is the wife of former England football legend and current Rangers manager Steven Gerrard, was seen for the first time in months and she was looking incredible.

The mum-of-four wore a black silk corset dress with a suspender belt that accentuated her long legs and shapely figure.

Alex was attending The Fitness Professional Awards which recognise achievements and excellence in the booming fitness industry, as well as raising money for their dedicated charity, An Hour For Others.

(Image: iCelebTV)

(Image: iCelebTV)

Among this this year's winner were her hubby Steven's healthy water brand Angel Revive but unfortunately Alex didn't get the chance to present him with the gong as he was with his team, as the played Motherwell in the Scottish Premier League.

Alex wasn't left looking a gooseberry though as Steven accepted the the accolade via video link as she cheered him on.

(Image: Instagram /stevengerrard)

After being a regular on the social scene in Liverpool, Alex has taken a back step since Steven moved into football management north of the border.

Fashion critic Alex has been with Steven since 2002 and they tied the knot at Cliveden House in Buckinghamshire in a romantic ceremony, back in 2007.

Steven and Alex are proud parents to Lilly-Ella, 15, Lexi, aged 13, Lourdes, seven, and Lio, two.
